ml.alternet.parser

Interface EventsHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataHandler<T>, Handler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HandlerAccumulator, HandlerBuffer, NodeBuilder, SysoutHandler, TokensCollector, TreeHandler

    public interface EventsHandler
    Events receiver when a grammar is parsing an input.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  EventsHandler.NumberValue
      A number as the token value.
      static class  EventsHandler.RuleEnd
      Event fired when a rule ends ; indicates whether the rule was fulfilled or not.
      static class  EventsHandler.RuleEvent<R extends Grammar.Rule>
      When a rule or token is matched while parsing.
      static class  EventsHandler.RuleStart
      Event fired when a rule starts.
      static class  EventsHandler.StringValue
      A string as the token value.
      static class  EventsHandler.TokenValue<T>
      A wrapper of a parsed value, the token that creates it, and the position where the value was found when available.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Handler asHandler()
      Return this event receiver as a rewindable handler.
      void receive(EventsHandler.RuleEnd ruleEnd)
      Receive a rule end event, even for a rule that was annotated with Grammar.Fragment : the handler has to check the state of the token value to process it properly.
      void receive(EventsHandler.RuleStart ruleStart)
      Receive a rule start event, even for a rule that was annotated with Grammar.Fragment : the handler has to check the state of the token value to process it properly.
      void receive(EventsHandler.TokenValue<?> value)
      Receive a token value, even for a token that was annotated with Grammar.Fragment : the handler has to check the state of the token value to process it properly.

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        void receive(EventsHandler.TokenValue<?> value)
        Receive a token value, even for a token that was annotated with Grammar.Fragment : the handler has to check the state of the token value to process it properly.
        Parameters:
        value - The token value

      • receive

        void receive(EventsHandler.RuleStart ruleStart)
        Receive a rule start event, even for a rule that was annotated with Grammar.Fragment : the handler has to check the state of the token value to process it properly.
        Parameters:
        ruleStart - The rule start event

      • receive

        void receive(EventsHandler.RuleEnd ruleEnd)
        Receive a rule end event, even for a rule that was annotated with Grammar.Fragment : the handler has to check the state of the token value to process it properly.
        Parameters:
        ruleEnd - The rule end event

      • asHandler

        default Handler asHandler()
        Return this event receiver as a rewindable handler.
        Returns:
        A handler with rewindable capabilities.
        See Also:
        Rewindable
